item.source: A mounted horse for runescape 317 yes or no?

item.title: A mounted horse for runescape 317 yes or no?
item.dc:creator: @teh0wn_ltd teh0wn ltd
item.description:
@teh0wn_ltd wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:311069”]Lol, I don’t think you realise how much work this requires, I’ve attempted a ride on cow before, yes… cow because I couldn’t find a horse, lol, and it failed, due to animating problems.

Have you even tried manual animation through metasequoia before?
You’re gonna need that for a start.

Then also you gotta stop the legs moving through the item.java’s, then you will need to create standing, walking, running etc animations through rsposer for the horse, and be able to then set them animations server side.

Before all of this, you will need some darn good ints, here’s an example, of the ints for a cow, class5.java code.
he warned u

aString65 (Name): Cow
aByteArray89 (Examine): Converts grass to beef.
anInt61 (Combat Level): 2
anInt55 (Turn <90° Animation): -1
anInt56 (?): 9
anInt57 (?): -1
anInt58 (Turn 180° Animation): -1
anInt59 (?): -1
anInt61 (?): 2
anInt62 (?): 3852
anInt63 (?): 9
anInt64 (?): 1834
aStringArray66 (Actions):
- aStringArray66[1]: Attack
anInt67 (Walk Animation): 58
aByte68 (NPC Size): 2
anInt69 (?): 9
anIntArray70 (New Colors):
- anIntArray70[0]: 10365
- anIntArray70[1]: 5784
- anIntArray70[2]: 10365
anInt71 (?): -1
anIntArray72.length: 3852
anIntArray73 (Dialogue Models): null
anInt74 (?): 748
anInt75 (?): -1
anIntArray76 (Old Colors):
- anIntArray76[0]: 26
- anIntArray76[1]: 10363
- anIntArray76[2]: 30
anInt77 (Stand Animation): 2162
aLong78 (?): 81
anInt79 (?): 32
aBoolean81 (?): false
anInt83 (?): -1
aBoolean84 (?): true
anInt85 (?): 0
anInt86 (?): 128
aBoolean87 (?): true
anIntArray88 (?): null
aByteArray89 (?):
- aByteArray89[0]: 67
- aByteArray89[1]: 111
- aByteArray89[2]: 110
- aByteArray89[3]: 118
- aByteArray89[4]: 101
- aByteArray89[5]: 114
- aByteArray89[6]: 116
- aByteArray89[7]: 115
- aByteArray89[8]: 32
- aByteArray89[9]: 103
- aByteArray89[10]: 114
- aByteArray89[11]: 97
- aByteArray89[12]: 115
- aByteArray89[13]: 115
- aByteArray89[14]: 32
- aByteArray89[15]: 116
- aByteArray89[16]: 111
- aByteArray89[17]: 32
- aByteArray89[18]: 98
- aByteArray89[19]: 101
- aByteArray89[20]: 101
- aByteArray89[21]: 102
- aByteArray89[22]: 46
anInt90 (?): -1
anInt91 (?): 128
anInt92 (?): 0
aBoolean93 (?): false
anIntArray94 (NPC Models):
- anIntArray94[0]: 3341
- anIntArray94[1]: 3342
anInt96 (?): -1

:rolleyes:

Try understanding all of that.

I’m not trying to be unkind, but this is gonna take a lot of effort, so, good luck.[/quote]

item.title: A mounted horse for runescape 317 yes or no?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Lol, I don’t think you realise how much work this requires, I’ve attempted a ride on cow before, yes… cow because I couldn’t find a horse, lol, and it failed, due to animating problems.

Have you even tried manual animation through metasequoia before?
You’re gonna need that for a start.

Then also you gotta stop the legs moving through the item.java’s, then you will need to create standing, walking, running etc animations through rsposer for the horse, and be able to then set them animations server side.

Before all of this, you will need some darn good ints, here’s an example, of the ints for a cow, class5.java code.

aString65 (Name): Cow
aByteArray89 (Examine): Converts grass to beef.
anInt61 (Combat Level): 2
anInt55 (Turn <90° Animation): -1
anInt56 (?): 9
anInt57 (?): -1
anInt58 (Turn 180° Animation): -1
anInt59 (?): -1
anInt61 (?): 2
anInt62 (?): 3852
anInt63 (?): 9
anInt64 (?): 1834
aStringArray66 (Actions):
- aStringArray66[1]: Attack
anInt67 (Walk Animation): 58
aByte68 (NPC Size): 2
anInt69 (?): 9
anIntArray70 (New Colors):
- anIntArray70[0]: 10365
- anIntArray70[1]: 5784
- anIntArray70[2]: 10365
anInt71 (?): -1
anIntArray72.length: 3852
anIntArray73 (Dialogue Models): null
anInt74 (?): 748
anInt75 (?): -1
anIntArray76 (Old Colors):
- anIntArray76[0]: 26
- anIntArray76[1]: 10363
- anIntArray76[2]: 30
anInt77 (Stand Animation): 2162
aLong78 (?): 81
anInt79 (?): 32
aBoolean81 (?): false
anInt83 (?): -1
aBoolean84 (?): true
anInt85 (?): 0
anInt86 (?): 128
aBoolean87 (?): true
anIntArray88 (?): null
aByteArray89 (?):
- aByteArray89[0]: 67
- aByteArray89[1]: 111
- aByteArray89[2]: 110
- aByteArray89[3]: 118
- aByteArray89[4]: 101
- aByteArray89[5]: 114
- aByteArray89[6]: 116
- aByteArray89[7]: 115
- aByteArray89[8]: 32
- aByteArray89[9]: 103
- aByteArray89[10]: 114
- aByteArray89[11]: 97
- aByteArray89[12]: 115
- aByteArray89[13]: 115
- aByteArray89[14]: 32
- aByteArray89[15]: 116
- aByteArray89[16]: 111
- aByteArray89[17]: 32
- aByteArray89[18]: 98
- aByteArray89[19]: 101
- aByteArray89[20]: 101
- aByteArray89[21]: 102
- aByteArray89[22]: 46
anInt90 (?): -1
anInt91 (?): 128
anInt92 (?): 0
aBoolean93 (?): false
anIntArray94 (NPC Models):
- anIntArray94[0]: 3341
- anIntArray94[1]: 3342
anInt96 (?): -1

:rolleyes:

Try understanding all of that.

I’m not trying to be unkind, but this is gonna take a lot of effort, so, good luck.
